name: Pro Gold ProLink Chain Lube - 4 oz/118ml
description: Keep dirt and resulting rust away from your chain and sprocket with this all-in-one chain lube and cleaner. The waterproof formula removes all other lubricants; prevents dirt and grit from sticking to the chain, and doesn't wash off in wet conditions. It also lasts 2 to 3 times longer than your average lube.Friction-reducing ingredient helps prevent wear.118ml.
